attributes.action: Independence Day for England, Wales, NI
attributes.additional_details:
Should Scotland vote for independence on the 18th of September, this petition would call for a apublic holiday for the rest of the UK on the date of Indepedence from Scotland, and unfair and biased Scottish rule.

This public holiday should be a recurring one, not a one off, for England, Wales and Northern Ireland and the overseas territories.
